amendment.description: To make available, from amounts appropriated for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Navy, $5,000,000 for support of the TIGER pathogen detection system.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3543 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3543 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S7383; text: CR S7383) To make available, from amounts appropriated for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Navy, $5,000,000 for support of the TIGER pathogen detection system.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3543 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3543 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Feinstein.
